text: Judah Bezalel ben Ze'ev Wolf Eliasberg (; 1800, Ivenitz, Russia – 1847, Minsk, Russia) was a Hebrew writer and translator. He translated from Polish to Hebrew the medical work of Friedrich Felix Pauliczki, published in 1834 under the title Marpe le-Am ('Healing for the Populace'). ==References== ==External links== * Sefer marpe la-ʻam: kolel etsot tovot le-khalkel ha-beri'ut at the YIVO Institute for Jewish Research Category:1800 births Category:1847 deaths Category:Belarusian Jews Category:Imperial Russian Jews Category:Translators to Hebrew
